Text: Settled precedent when convenient, ‘sudden and radical’ when not. @SenatorCollins - wrong then and wrong today. https://t.co/Lt1vzAcyge
Blame should be placed squarely on the shoulders of @SenatorCollins and all Senators who confirmed this court and enabled this to happen.

The Supreme Court’s ruling is devastating and disastrous. Roe v. Wade ensured that my generation had control of our bodies and our future. I am furious that as of today the same won’t be said for my children’s generation.

Alongside many millions of Americans today, I am appalled and angry. Support organizations, elected officials and candidates that *actually* support reproductive rights and will fight to strengthen them.

What faith will Americans have in the Judiciary as a separate branch of government when such a politically motivated court - Trump appointed and confirmed by GOP Senate enablers like #Maine's own Susan Collins - leave people with no access to this right and this care?

For nearly 50 years under Roe v. Wade, abortion has been rightfully established as health care that a person can access safely and on their own terms. Now politically motivated right-wing Supreme Court justices made clear that their intent has been, and will be, to overturn that.

Maine nonprofits are integral to every facet of our communities and have been working overtime amidst the pandemic. Proud to be able to support the incredible work happening @ProsperityMaine. 
https://t.co/KJfxqnUTpy
This is great news for Maine families! Learn more about the Build HOPE Project @MeEqualJustice: https://t.co/y6gTtmSQqH
Merry Christmas! Grateful to be surrounded by family and friends - I hope you are, too!

Stories like Hilary's are exactly why we're establishing the Build HOPE Project at @MeEqualJustice. Check out her column in today's @PressHerald: 
https://t.co/ihBSlU4xth
.@MeEqualJustice will launch the Build HOPE Project in January 2022. FMI check out their website and contact them at: https://t.co/BMrCoIvsPz

Establishing the Build HOPE Project through @MeEqualJustice is an effort to ensure more #Maine kids and their parents can reach their full potential. Check out my column in the @bangordailynews to learn more: 
https://t.co/01ewf9yySI

The Build HOPE Project is the result of thoughtful planning nearly a year in the making and as a result will fill a genuine void in Maine for both working families and our workforce. Learn more about the program here: https://t.co/Yw4aogHF0W

This gift will provide immediate and significant support to working parents earning their degree, to their children -- and ultimately to the entire state of #Maine -- by increasing the numbers of higher skilled workers badly needed by Maine’s employers and our economy.

Over the years I've worked closely with @MeEqualJustice enacting reforms to help move people out of poverty and into the workforce. Today, I'm announcing a $3.5 million dollar gift to establish the Build HOPE Project to continue that work.
It is the first night of #Hanukkah. In my home, for the next eight evenings, we’ll light the menorah and celebrate the perseverance and persistence of faith. Chag sameach!

Today, my family will have our annual tradition of enjoying time in the #Maine outdoors and then celebrating around the dinner table with friends and family. May you all have a lovely #ThanksgivingDay !

Quality child care, universal pre-k, and paid family leave are all part of @POTUS #AmericanFamiliesPlan.

That's exactly what's needed for our kids, our families, and our economic future.
Supporting American families means investing in policies that help them succeed—from when they are infants to when they become parents themselves. #JointAddress

“We must meet this moment as the United States of America. If we do that, I guarantee you we will not fail. We have never ever, ever, ever failed in America when we’ve acted together.”

Congratulations to President Biden & Vice President Harris. God bless you & God bless America.

Donald Trump represents a clear and present danger to our democracy. 

He must be impeached.
Congratulations to Senators-elect @ReverendWarnock and @ossoff on their historic victories. Their service is more important now than ever.

What’s happening in the Capitol right now is a terrifying attempt to thwart our democracy and a heartbreaking moment for our country.

@realdonaldtrump must call off this violence immediately.

We can build a better future for this country—and that starts with electing @ossoff and @ReverendWarnock.

So go vote today, Georgia! Find your polling location here: https://t.co/CN1shSgjwA

After a difficult year, so many of our neighbors are in need.

This holiday season, help keep our communities fed — join me in supporting the organizations on the frontlines of this critical work: https://t.co/RcIXp6dS5j

Today, I’m grateful for our frontline and essential workers, who have sacrificed so much for our families. 

It’s been a tough year, but we’ll get through it together. Wishing you a safe and happy Thanksgiving.

Congratulations to @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris—thank you for bringing leadership and decency back to the White House.

Today, our democracy won. Tomorrow, we get back to work and start building back a better future for Mainers and Americans.

Thank you, Maine. I’m proud of the campaign we ran, regardless of the result—together we built a movement that will help us make progress for years to come.

While this election may be over, we can't afford to stop organizing. So let’s get some rest, and then get back to work.
At 1:30 pm, I’ll be making remarks about our race—tune in here: https://t.co/3l9RxPV3Ps

As long as you're in line by 8 pm, you can cast your ballot. 

Stay in line!

Tonight marked our 40th #SupperWithSara. From our first supper in Kennebunkport to our final event in Unity, I'm so grateful for everyone who’s joined us over the past 16 months. Hearing from you has been at the heart of this campaign, & that won’t change when I’m in the Senate. https://t.co/Ryt0MS9kyr

I just left Waldo County to finish out our Putting Maine First Tour! 4 days, 16 counties, and hundreds of miles later, I’m so grateful for everyone who joined me on the trail. One more day—let’s go win! #mepolitics https://t.co/LaSveZeQU0

As this campaign draws to a close, I am so unbelievably grateful for this grassroots movement and everything that we've achieved together over the past 16 months.

We've got one more day. Let's do this, Maine. #mepolitics https://t.co/stJXug8tB8

If I’m elected to the U.S. Senate, here’s what I’ll do: 
1️⃣ Roll back the GOP tax cuts for big corporations
2️⃣ Take bold action on climate change
3️⃣ Protect & expand access to affordable health care
4️⃣ Confirm qualified judicial nominees who respect precedent #mepolitics

Health care is on the ballot. Civil rights are on the ballot. The environment is on the ballot. 

We have one more day to win this race. Let's leave it all on the field, Maine. #mepolitics https://t.co/wc59ipN9A7

The stakes in this election could not be higher. We need a Senate majority that will protect civil rights for all Mainers & Americans, and we can't afford to confirm any more of Mitch McConnell & Donald Trump's unqualified, far-right judges. #mepolitics https://t.co/oEaxMAv3rb

I visited Full Circle Health Care in Presque Isle to discuss my plans to protect and expand access to health care, especially for Mainers living in rural communities. Health care is on the ballot this election. #mepolitics https://t.co/VbWryJYjSP
